Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: A great and easy DIY project for your home
Author: Kane
Review: Today I installed this toilet in my home and retired my 40+ year old commode. first the box and its contents are very well constructed,the box had cutouts that made handling this toilet very easy so I could move it around the house till I was ready to install. The toilet itself is very solid and well constructed it included the wax ring and all hardware needed to put this together in about 30 minutes. the Tank mounted really solid and I didn't have to crank down on the nuts to get it to seal. My...

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Total package. This is a complete kit.
Author: Tony
Review: This is a very stylish toilet. The kit is complete from the floor up ( except for the connecting water line). When I received the box it was very well packaged with adequate amounts of heavy duty triple wall corrugated box and other packing material as needed. The kit is complete with the toilet base, the toilet tank, the float and valve assembly for inside the tank and the toilet seat as well as all the hardware needed and the wax ring. The included instructions are complete and straightforward. The toilet complete setup job only took me about 30 minutes once I had removed my old one. I really like the classic modern design and it blended well with the white porcelain tub and sink and the chrome hardware on same. I certainly give this a thumbs up.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Easy install with straight forward instructions
Author: Squiggysasquatch
Review: This toilet was easy to install with simple instructions. The design fit our bathroom nicely since it has angled corners on the front of the tank which compliments our neo-angle shower. A few minor inconveniences were the toilet seat had some sharp plastic areas that needed to be trimmed up with a razor blade and the bolts securing the toilet to the floor had to be trimmed down to allow the plastic caps to snap on. See pictures.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Royal flush
Author: Pilotmike
Review: Pleasantly surprised everything came in the box new bolts. seat. wax ring really a quality product took about 30 minutes to install toilet has a super flush seems to be a little bit higher than the old one which is much nicer I would highly recommend this to anybody looking to upgrade to a new toilet Also really like the slow close seat no more banging

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Very poor packaging
Author: Shane
Review: Box was undamaged so i removed the old toilet before completely unboxing this one. After i installed the bowl i opened the tank box and installed tank, to find the lid busted. Too late gotta have a toilet! So i go to install the seat, nope the hinge is broken so for tonight we will have to use the wrong shaped seat from the old toilet. This unit is complete with everything to install and very straightforward installation. Be sure to check all parts before removing your old toilet!!!!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice toilet with a powerful flush
Author: UncleEd
Review: This is a solid toilet, comes with everything you need. It installs very quickly, make sure to tighten all the bolts slowly you don't want to crack anything. The bolts for the back tank are easy and the seat installs with a screwdriver. We Replaced the smaller toilet that originally came in the basement. The elongated bowl and the higher seat makes this a all around nice upgrade.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Complete kit to install
Author: phillytn
Review: Nice toilet and comes with everything for the installation, including soft-close seat. I replaced the wax ring with a reusable silicone seal but wax will work if you'll never have to remove the toilet. Easy to install. Took about 1/2 hour. Nice glazing job. I couldn't find any flaws in the finish. Conventional flushing valve. Fairly quiet operation. About 1" higher seat height than the American Standard toilet that it replaced.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Poor Quality
Author: Jim
Review: I was furnished this product to conduct testing and provide a review. Based on the item I had, I cannot recommend this product. I will caveat this with the fact that I only tested one and it very well could haver been faulty. So check other reviews also to see if others had the same problems. First thing I noticed was a lot of powder that came off of the toilet, so you will want to wipe it off well before bringing it into the house. The porcelain mold also left something to be desired. The instructions were fairly straight forward with diagrams. To test this toilet, I placed it on a level surface, hooked it up to a garden hose, and hooked that up to a standard supply line. The hose water pressure was the same as the interior of the house. The first real issue was with the bowl gasket. It had a grove that should be able to go over a lip on the bowl, but there was no lip. Even with heavy tightening of the bolts, the gasket would not sit right (see photo 1). I even tried to seat it onto the bowl first and it still would not seat well (photo 2). The fill valve was way off from the proper adjustment. The water kept flowing. It took a lot of turns to get the water to the right level. I would have expected the fill valve to at least be close to the right setting. After I set the water level, I added a blue dye so I could see how well the water circulated in the bowl during a flush (Photo 3). It actually did quite well in covering all sides of the bowl (Photo 4). The last issue I had was with the flapper. Most flappers will open up and remain open until the tank is fairly empty. On this tank, I had to hold the handle down during the entire flush in order to empty the tank. Pressing and releasing a second or two resulted in half the tank not emptying (photo 5). This flapper could not go back because the fill tube was in the way (photo 6). Bad design? I try to give every product I test the benefit of the doubt, but unfortunately, if this particular unit is typical of the bulk of the toilets, I just cannot recommend it.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Finally trying a taller toilet
Author: Henry
Review: So our parents have been telling us to get a taller toilet, and how much nicer they are.... well since I had the opportunity to get this toilet, then I made sure to get the taller one to at least make the parents happier when they visit. So the assembly was super easy, maybe cause I have rebuilt and replaced several toilets already. I did like that there is notches to rest against the tank once it is tightened down, making the tank feel more secure. I previously had installed an Danco perfect seal on the floor flange, Item #3844101. This is also the third time I have seated a toilet on this flange so I highly recommend picking up one. They are under all my toilets and make repairs and reinstalls so much easier then having to use a new wax ring. Once the toilet is installed, using wood shims to level, I slide a few paper straps under the toilet and flush repeated to check the seal. After 10 flushes, no water on paper, and I finish the install. The best part is our parents are now happier when they come to visit cause there is a taller toilet in the house.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice toilet
Author: Matt
Review: The toilet itself looks nice. Has a sleek design that elevates the look of the bathroom. Install is simple and comes with all the parts you need. The slow close lid is nice that it’s not loud when shut. I have a couple kids and am constantly asking them not to slam the lid. Nice that it’s not possible now. That said the lid (not the seat) is a little flimsy and I’m not able to sit on it without it bending in. I don’t think it’ll break but I also won’t be testing it. I also found the water refilling noise to be quite loud. I did turn the water down from fully open and that did eliminate it. Good to note if you have higher home water pressure. Other then that it’s been working great. If you’re looking to update the look of an older bathroom this could be a good fit.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Exceptional quality and feel , should last decades
Author: Buzz
Review: First off I was curious how a complete two piece toilet was packaged in a single box. It was packaged real well with abundant cardboard cushioning and placement in the box. So if you have to transport this toilet rest assured it is well packed. Next the toilet tank and lid are in their own box setting on the upside down bowl , the face of the bowl rests on about 1 3/8" of cardboard. The weight of the bowl is impressively heavy, so it should stand up to heavy use by a family. The tank assembly has some very well designed components inside including the 3" flapper assembly . The handle is all metal and should be strong enough to last. The unit comes complete with all mounting hardware and the soft close seat which is made from a long lasting polymer, easy to clean , with a finish that will not degrade. I think that this is a toilet that will satisfy the demands of most homeowners for a long time. It is a ADA compliant comfort height toilet which is a big plus.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: High Quality
Author: Edward
Review: I had never heard of Mansfield before but rest assured this is as good a quality as any of the common names such as Kohler or American Standard. The removal of a 30+ year old round toilet and the installation of this higher, elongated commode was a relatively easy process. I removed all the old wax ring, used my Simple Green to clean the floor and followed the simple instructions. I did adjust the tank level to a lower setting. This is a fast flush unit that will give you two flush cycles on one tank of water. So it is indeed a much more efficient unit than the old one and I think better than our two which are less than five years old. Mansfield even packaged it with a slow close seat and lid....very nice.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Pretty tall toilet
Author: BobC
Review: This ada compliant toilet is pretty tall. My wife is 5’7 and her feet do not lay flat on the floor. I have another comfort height toilet that is a little shorter. Toilet came with bolts and wax ring. Toilet works well after I loosened the flush handle. When I first installed the toilet it would stick in the flush position. I also added a slow close toilet lid.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Easiest Install
Author: Dave
Review: This was the easiest replacement I have done. The Toilet comes with everything I needed to replace my existing toilet. The only tools required was a Crescent Wrench, Philip Screw driver and Pliers. i like how simple it was to adjust the water level, there a line on the fill tube. The instruction was easy to follow. Total time to remove and install was less than 2 Hours. Bidet seat will work on this toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Well made toilet. Stylish too.
Author: Rick
Review: The packaging of this unit is exceptional. This was ship to be common carrier and the outside of the box was a little messed up. However, when I open the box all the components were completely intact. No breakage or scratches. This one is a comfort height or chair height. It is approximately17” from the floor to the top of the bowl with the seat up. The quality is apparent right out of the box. The internal flush valve and flapper are quality. The unit is quiet and refill is quick. I am sure this will last a least 40 years or more which is way past my lifetime. Looking for a new quality quiet toilet? Look no further. BUY IT.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good product
Author: Malc07
Review: This came with everything in the box, including the seat! Nice style and everything that you need to install it, the only thing that I found difficult were the instructions! The top tank leaked a little when I installed it but it was soon taken care of! The large nut that holds the inside together was loose, a simple tightening and I was set! Great value and super quiet. Only takes a minute to refill after flushing!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Perfect height
Author: tonyb2760
Review: This is one of the most comfortable height toilets I have had the pleasure of using. It is at the perfect height for comfort. I am just over six feet tall and the one I had before was just too low. It has plenty of flushing power, uses little water and took all but about one hour to install with the tools pictured, including removal and cleanup from the previous toilet. The tank level adjustment is the easiest and simplest designs I have seen. See photo. It's not loud during the flush, but it's not quite either.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good quality toilet
Author: Lj11
Review: This product was shipped to me quickly, and was in perfect condition upon arrival. It was very easy to install, using minimal tools, and it looks great. Let's face it, the toilet isn't necessarily what you want the focal point of your bathroom to be, but it does look nice. I love it's efficient water use, and it does have a very powerful flush! The only thing that prevented me from giving it 5 stars, is that it is significantly loader when flushing then my previous toilet. I believe the difference in noise level is a result of the power of the flush, so keep that in mind when choosing where to install it. We installed it in our quarter bath off our living room, so now when anyone flushes, you can definitely hear it more. All in all, I would recommend this product!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice
Author: Jeff
Review: Pretty nice toilet! Easy to install, especially if you've done one before. Even if you haven't, it's still easy, since all the tank parts are already installed. This is the comfort height, so it's more suitable for taller people. I'm 5'5", but it is in a bathroom that belongs to someone taller then me! Everything you need is included.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Fast to empty and no surprise left behind
Author: Burns
Review: You get what you pay for and Denali has always been synonymous with top quality and the Toilet has delivery completely. The build quality is flawless. From the soft closing lid to appease your significant other to the economical flushes, but still delivers maximum performance so there is no need to flush twice. The high perfect which I personally would call chair height. Easy on easy off. The elongated bowl is mor convenient than the traditional round bowl and accommodate more varying body types. The porcelain is perfectly finished with no sharp edges even where you will not be using. Even item needed for installation is provided except tool and labor. Instillation is pretty straight forward. One person can accomplish this on there own.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Had high hopes for this one
Author: Simon
Review: Doing a remodel of our bathroom and decided to replace the old dated toilet. Always though Mansfield was a top brand so we when with the Denali. Install was a breeze but shortly after it was hooked up I noticed water around the base, thought maybe it was the seal so I replaced it. Same issue! took it off flange and turned it over and notice a hairline crack on the inside of the front of the base. Could clearly see where water was seeping through. So road trip to our nearest Lowes(3.5 hrs round trip to return it and get a replacement. only to find out that the replacement has the same hairline crack in almost the same spot. So packed it back up and made another 3.5 hour road trip but this time we went with an American Standard brand. No leaking from that one.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great for the price!!!
Author: Crice611
Review: Decided to replace my toilet in my garage. Got this one. Very easy to install. Directions were clear and easy to follow. Came with all the parts. Very comfortable. I love the gloss white finish. Flushes very well. Could definitely see myself replacing another with this same exact toilet. Would recommend to anyone

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Over-engineered packaging under engineered product
Author: Ncgater
Review: The positives, seems to flush well. Bottom half is solid. That is about it. Negatives, let's start with the defect, see photo. Very visible and should have been caught at the product inspection stage. I mean, this is the forward facing part of the lid. Next, installation. The flange bolts have to be CUT to fit underneath the caps. Hello, no one has heard of the easy snap-off. Next, the plastic nuts. I mean, you package the product in a $50 box but give me plastic nuts to attach the tank to the base? And the lid. You gonna' buy this? Invest in different toilet seat. You will thank me for this. I mean, this is not a budget toilet. Common' folks!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: I'm buying a different toilet for swap #2
Author: ToeKneeTM
Review: Caught this on sale. This was my first ever toilet swap, so I'm going to give this 2 stars for ease of install ONLY. It really was mostly painless. It was after install that I started disliking this toilet. First, the flushing mechanism sucks. I've had to constantly adjust it to get a full flush. Second, and the BIGGEST gripe is the bowl water dispersion. It is the worst I've ever seen. I spend more time wiping out this bowl than any toilet I've ever used. Lastly, the toilet seat and lid doesn't sit properly and no matter how much I tighten it, it moves. I would NOT buy this toilet, especially for regular price.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good except poor design where tank meets the base
Author: metaljackets
Review: Overall, I like this toilet. It has a very powerful flush, a really nice soft close lid, and good visual appeal. However; I dinged it two stars over one aspect... the design where the tank meets the base. It only utilizes 2 bolts, and they don't provide enough compression. The result is a tank that flexes if pressure is applied to it (such as sitting back to hard). It hasn't leaked, thankfully, but even after adding some rubber tape to stabilize it, there is still some flex, and I'm concerned this will become an issue over time. The toilet I replaced had 3 bolts, and thick rubber compression washers.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Poor cut/seal- excess on lis
Author: Mp07
Review: Bought 3 of these toilets for my home damaged from Hurricane Ida. When finally installing these 2 of the 3 have this excess on the lids. Really frustrating when Im just ready to move home.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Some Lowes, some manufacturing
Author: Steve
Review: First offered off the shelf was an open box. Wax ring was used. Lid busted. Why put it back in stock? Second one. Checked it out. In tact. Started install and realized the tank mounting hardware was gone. Ran to Lowes and they yanked it from the busted unit. All good. Then during tank install I noticed a casting imperfection that those sketchy looking mount bolts would likely not seal. Gorilla sealant on hand I shot that on the mating faces. Here's to hop because I need this toilet up to finish the flooring in another bathroom. Will have to think about the toilet for the next room. I will say the employee was very helpful to sort this out easily

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Author: Randy
Review: I purchased and installed this toilet based on the reviews. The Toilet tank insulation lining is not bonded to the tank on the two sides therefore any contact with the liner in that area will break the liner. Also the tank bolt holes do not line up 100% to the bowel which caused the bolts to be installed on a slight angle which (on the first installation attempt) cause all three bolts to leak. After adding marine silicone to the bolt seals the bolt sealed fine but after filling the tank I found the tank (was cracked which was not cracked during installation). I had to return the toilet and purchased and American Standard with with liner for nearly the same price. The American Standard is is a much better toilet. Don't waste your time with this toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: This toilet is powerful!
Author: Wawa
Review: Color was slightly darker than I was expecting. The sink and tub were a shade and a half lighter, but it’s not an extreme difference.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet for adults!
Author: Kelmar97
Review: Best product we could find in the area. The anti-stain glazing will make a big difference.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Bad toilet or bad retailer?
Author: Willbuyagain
Review: I am now convinced that big box stores sell seconds. If you look at Lowes reviews of Mansfield, Kohler and American Standard you see many of the same quality problems. No wonder they sell for 1/2 of plumbing supply houses. In 8 hours at work my new toilet leaks half the contents of the bowl on my new floor. The toilet obviously has a crack or defect in the trap. I just ordered the same brand from a plumbing supply and when I asked the guy on the phone if the had many problems with that brand, he said "none". Coincidence?

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: LEAKS!
Author: leaktoilet
Review: very poor quality. constant drip at the red gasket between the bowl and tank. does not matter how much or little you tighten. whats up with the groove in the red gasket? piece of garbage. do not bother to call CS . nobody there .

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Extermely difficult to attach tank to bowl
Author: Luke
Review: Can never get the tank to stop leaking from the flange where it attaches to the bowl. This is my first and last mansfield toilet. American Standard has always never leaked for me and flushes much better. Get American Standard toilet.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Surprisingly good
Author: Scotty2Hotty
Review: Just purchased & installed Denali in bone color ar my parents house. It replaced an older,lower 1 piece kohler unit. I wanted to do an American Standard, but none were available in bone/off white & elongated, chair height at my local Lowe's. Other option was a Kohler model, but it had some fancy piston flushing valve system. Saw this Mansfield Denali unit, simple fluid master flush system, reviews looked good, made in USA. So gave it a shot. Packaged extremely well, nothing broke, damaged etc. Quick easy directions Installed real nice & looks great. Flushes like a champ Really glad I gave it a shot

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: This toilet fits with baseboards behind toilet!
Author: PamsMommy
Review: The Denali Elongated Comfort Height toilet is great! We had trouble finding a toilet that would fit in our bathroom because we have a baseboard for heat behind the toilet. We a so needed a toilet in bone because our new tub and sink are both bone. There are not many bone toilets available for purchase in any store. This toilet twas able to fit because it's base footprint is not as long behind the floor bolt as the majoy of toilets being sold. It has a nice powerful flush which is quieter than our previous toilet and uses less water. We love it!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Crack and factory added porcelain over it to seal
Author: Mossey1526
Review: Cracked under the bow; from factory and they tried to seal it. Shame on them for poor quality control. I see why nobody is selling Manfeild anymore. Had to take off drive 30 min and buy a new different company's toilet and it worked perfect. Stay away, avoid this and also it sat crooked even thow floor was level. Terrible experience from a long-time buyer.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Mansfield Denali "ELONGATED"
Author: Boogbeer
Review: The install of the tank was a pain the gasket MUST be in place just right or it will leak. The flapper valve doesn't close correctly and leaks and it will stay up and water runs . The seat wasn't the correct seat .. it's an elongated model and they put in a round seat and now I must fight with someone to get me a new seat It does flush nicely

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great functionality
Author: Mpowered
Review: I love the higher seat and the color. Also the slow closing seat is great!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Happy with toilet except...
Author: tipijo
Review: We have been very pleased with this toilet. strong quick flush. no leaks, not hard to install. my only criticism is the tank lid is not flat. there's a slight raised hump in the middle. anything you put on the lid either slides forward or backwards.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Acceptable, water efficient, and made in the USA
Author: ElChupacabara
Review: Well packaged, reasonable price, easy to install, seat does not move, and toilet is sturdy. Solid waste flushes easily, but occasionally requires an extra flush to leave the bowl looking clean. I replaced my 3.6 GPF and would never be able to do a second flush without waiting for it to refill. This tank holds plenty of water so you to make that extra flush without waiting. Make sure to depress the handle completely to activate the refill valve. Of note, the seat is probably going to be a pain to clean the hinge area as its all open and dust and debris will undoubtedly collect.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: 1 out of 2
Author: wise1420
Review: Just recently we had our Guest Bath and Master Suite Bg ath refloored. While doing so we decided to replace the 2 toilets. We purchased 2 Mansfield Denali and proceeded to install while the flooring was being replaced. 1st Denali went well and is performing beautifully. The second Denali did not fair so well. 3 times I had to pull the toilet and replaced the wax ring because its contimued to leak underneath on the left side. I just had a professional come out and after replacing the wax ring for the 4th time he discovered the Denali had a small crack. Very dissapointed and I feel this needs to be replaced. Also the flush lever sticks when you push down and you manually need to pull back or the water will continue to run.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Looks really nice, quick flush 1 gal flush.
Author: Suzy1
Review: I like the height of the toliet.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Denali Complete Toilet Package
Author: Derrick522
Review: The Denali WaterSense Elongated Comfort Height 2-Piece Toilet came complete with everything needed to install, to include a new wax ring and slow close seat. The smartheight is ADA compliant which allows for easy sit and stand which helps with arthritic knees. The powerful flush only uses 1.28 gpf which saves on water usage while still emptying the bowl. The slow close seat is really slow, but at least it doesn’t slam shut. The tank fill is rather quiet and easy to adjust. All and all, I am happy with this toilet and am glad that I don’t have sit so low.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Shop around.
Author: twayne
Review: The 3 toilets that I purchased came with the cheapest seats I have ever seen. That is a shame as the toilets themselves looked like great quality.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Check item before purchasing
Author: Patriick
Review: This toilet was broken in several pieces had to return it and get another one why was the broken one on the floor for sale?

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Made in U.S.A.!
Author: jlsonic
Review: First, I was appalled that "American Standard" toilets are made in Mexico! Denali are made in Ohio, by a company founded in the 1920's that employs hundreds of people in a small town. The Denai toilet if very well made, with a very powerful flush as promised! My plumber had little trouble installing it. Should anything go wrong inside, it should be easy to fix. The price was only about twenty dollars more than "American Standard"'s equivalent model. I am happy to pay just a bit more to support American workers and Made in U.S.A. products.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Author: Sharon
Review: I am very aggravated at the flushing. It doesn't get all the debris off the walls of the toilet and it seems I am going to have to clean the toilet after every use. It's not appealing to enter the bathroom and have to see fragments left on the side of the bowl from the person who used it before you. previous toilet was 40 years old and never had this problem Seems like the water line is not high enough to cleanse it when flushed or not enough water coming down all around the upper part to wash away debris.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Don't purchase this toilet!!!!
Author: Denny
Review: So tank bolts are not rubberized enough and the tank has been leaking since I got it,from the tank are fastened to the bowl. I had to go buy a different set of bolts for a Kohler toilet. It flushes okay it has enough power but they tried to cheap out on things like tank bolts which is very important.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Not white and looks and feels cheap
Review: The toilet is an off white color, does not match the rest of the white fixtures and even doesn't match the color of the included seat. The seat its self is cheap, feels flimsy and doesn't fit correctly. For a $200 price tag I would expect more.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Comfortable
Author: Mkw1
Review: My husband picked this toilet out, it is hard to find a toilet that is comfortable for a 6’5” person and this one works for him!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great toilet
Author: Denali
Review: This is a great upgrade and very nice that it sits so much higher than old one. I had a plumber install, and he said it was very easy, no problems at. He didn't really like the way the tank sat on the bowl, but there has been no problems with it at all. I really like the quick flush, and only have to hold down if needing to do a full flush.Have only had in installed for one week.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Idk
Author: Will
Review: Love this toilet, it sits a little high but it has a powerful fast flush.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Best Toilet for the Price
Author: Likes Comfort
Review: Super great toilet. Certainly a water saver. Easy to install.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Highly disappointed...
Author: Grif
Review: I never write reviews of anything, anywhere. But, this disappointment of a toilet has drawn me in. I thought this toilet was going to be great. Loved the made in USA aspect. However, it's lousy. First, the flapper falls way too fast, forcing you to hold the handle down for the flush duration. I have tried adjusting the foam float and the chain, but no matter what, if you push the handle and let it go, the flapper immediately falls and shuts. The instructions provide NO guidance on how to tune the flush. Second, the seat it comes with is garbage. If you stand to urinate, the seat falls down while you are going. Luckily, it's a slow fall, so you can catch it midstream, if you are quick! That or it slowing falls through the stream, rather than quickly passing through! Third, the flush is weak. Even holding the handle down the whole time, it is poor. No comparison to the American Standard (made in Thailand unfortunately) we have in the other bathroom. Pass on this toilet!!! After a week of use, I am considering pulling it and trying to get a refund or at least writing Lowes to try and get credit for a replacement seat and an adjustable fall rate flapper.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Author: Garrett0922

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet for the budget
Author: DaSleez
Review: Price was well within the budget and my repair man recommended the product

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Goes in easy
Author: Tracy
Review: Good quality , flushes nicely, handle doesn’t feel cheap

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Two failures
Author: Blob
Review: First the flush lever was binding on the inside reservoir lid. Of course you know what happens then. The tank never fills and a lot of water is wasted. Second failure is has started to short flush. Looked in the installation instructions & saw nothing on how to fix this. Disappointed. Shoulda bought a Kohler.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: THUNDER
Author: B Man
Review: They named this the Denali, I liked it. The name should have been Thunderous Avalanche on Denali! I am pleased with most aspects of this toilet, but believe me when I tell you that everyone in the house and maybe the neighbors will know when you’re done in the bathroom.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Don't but these Denali Elongated toilets.
Author: DeeDee
Review: The toilet seat did not fit the toilet. I had to purchase two new oblong seats to fit my purchase. Very disappointed

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Why two bolts instead of three?
Author: DanB
Review: This is a good product with a powerful flush. I reduced it by one star because it only has two bolts holding the tank to the bowl. Since the toilet displays are mounted on the wall over 6 feet high, I was unable to see that at the time of purchase.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: good toilet
Author: Daniel
Review: We installed it this week and it works well as the back bowl wall is almost straight down thus cleaning well. The seat and lid are thin plastic, and we wish they were as substantial as the ones on our 10-year-old Mansfield toilet. Are there options?

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Does not flush properly
Author: Bubba
Review: Installed this expecting to have great flush power. As soon as i let off the handle no more water in the bowl. Contacted mansfield with email, no response. Did some rigging with it to get it to stay open a bit longer but still not right

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: USA Made
Author: Betsy
Review: USA made product was easier to install than the American Standard toilet that had a broken tank lid in the bottom of its box. It is a water saver toilet whose flush is so powerful that it works cleanly and quietly.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Beautifully made
Author: BigSteve
Review: This looks better in person and is so well made. Comes with the seat and lid. Both slowly close themselves. Great value. I ordered it online and was delivered to my house.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Quality Toilet and Company, Must Hold Handle down
Author: avdoc
Review: Likes: Mansfield customer service was awesome. I called and spoke with them twice while deciding on purchasing this and they were very helpful. It's pretty (no logos on it anywhere, my wife likes handle on the side) and is solidly built/heavy. The flush is very strong when you hold the handle down (see dislikes) and it has anti-stick coating like other higher-end brand toilets. I chose it over similar American Standard (Champion) and Kohler (Cimmaron) toilets available at Lowes because these toilets have serious quality control issues (cracking and issues with flush valves, respectively). I did NOT use the included wax ring but instead used the Danco 4.75-in Toilet Wax Ring with Bolts Item #: 3844101 Model #: 10826X which I highly recommend as this allows you to reposition toilet if needed and it's a very secure fit on this toilet. Dislikes: You must hold the handle down to get a good flush. I talked to Mansfield about this and it's the way it's designed. The flapper they have doesn't float at all. I have purchased a new flapper to try from HomeDepot (Fluidmaster Universal 3 in. Premium Adjustable Toilet Flapper) that I'm hoping will allow for a good flush without holding the handle down. The flush is loud and the flapper slams down hard if you don't hold the handle down long enough. Also, it takes a long time for the tank to fill after flushing and it's louder than our previous toilet-most of the water goes into the bowl and not the tank. My wife feels the toilet sits a little high, but I'm fine with it-we're the same height so personal preference. Overall I'm pretty happy with the toilet and was VERY impressed with Mansfield's customer service. I had a hard time finding any information about this toilet before I bought, so I'm hoping this review helps other people decide on it.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Slow close not so slow
Author: Cathy
Review: I've had this seat for about one month. It is no longer 'slow closing.' Will be returning to store.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great Toilet Except for Fill Valve
Author: Susie
Review: The fill valve wouldn’t shut off and subsequently filled the overflow tube. The plumber had to install a new fill valve

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: it's the little things.
Author: howard
Review: comes with a very cheap seat. flush handle stuck down every flush no mater how i tried to adjust. had to replace

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice on the eyes, easy to install, great toilet!!
Author: Happywithmynewtoiletguy
Review: Love the chair style feature and the extra flushing power. This was easy to install & is a great product!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Good toilet.
Author: Orman
Review: The price point was good and since it came in two pieces (bowl and tank) it was easier to install.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Opinion
Author: wesleyd983
Review: It works. Needs to flush longer at the beginning. Stops when you let go of the handle.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nice toilet
Author: Jimmy
Review: Was easy to install. Only needed a pair of channel locks and a flat head screwdriver.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Nothing really, it comes with everything you need
Author: Missy
Review: This was the color I was looking for and I liked the style, and it flushes well!

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet .
Author: Adam B
Review: Great power on the flush side . Definitely would use this brand again

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: very water efficient and is very compact for the s
Author: Randy
Review: good price point, however when I picked it up the box was dirty

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: COMES WITH EVERYTHING NEEDED FOR INSTALLATION
Author: Missy
Review: VERY PLEASED, I LIKE THE SLEEK DESIGN AND IT FLUSHES VERY WELL.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: good for remodel as well as new construction
Author: dave
Review: everything was included in package. good brand, fit fine

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Great Toilet
Author: Debbie
Review: This is a very nice toilet and sleek design. Flushes well.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Excellent Value
Author: Magic
Review: Product has excellent quality and was price competitive

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Easy peasy, it’s all in the box, nice unit.
Author: Justdave
Review: Love the fact that everything you need is in the box.

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: This comes with everything you need
Author: Shawn
Review: Very easy to install and gives my bathroom anew look

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Toilet
Author: MrWhitefolks1234
Review: Great quality, nice and tall and a very strong flush

Product_name: Mansfield Denali White Elongated Chair Height 2-piece WaterSense Toilet 12-in Rough-In (ADA Compliant)
Subject: Simple good quality
Author: Kersh8210
Review: Nice size and height , works well and flushes good
